name: ecommerce
description: Full-Stack E-Commerce build using HTML5 and CSS3(Semantic Elements, CSS Grid, Flexbox), React(Components, Props, Events, Hooks, Routes, Axios), Redux(Store, Reducers, Actions), Node & Express(Web API, Body Parser, File Upload, JWT), MongoDB(Mongoose, Aggregation), Development(ESLint, Babel, Git, Github), Deployment(Heroku)

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build

author: Sayyid isal
